title: Ordered Action List Schema
description: Defines the format for an ordered action list JSON that respresents an array of player build orders (max 4 for team builds) in the WC3 Build Order Planner

items.description: Each item represents a single player's build order, in the array of all player build order's for the team

race.description: String identifying the race for this player's build order

orderedActionList.description: Array of actions, in order, representing a single player's build order
